ajaxapi Package¶

models Module¶

tests Module¶

This file demonstrates two different styles of tests (one doctest and one unittest). These will both pass when you run “manage.py test”.

Replace these with more appropriate tests for your application.

class openassembly.ajaxapi.tests.SimpleTest(methodName='runTest')[source]¶

Bases: django.test.testcases.TestCase

test_basic_addition()[source]¶

Tests that 1 + 1 always equals 2.

openassembly.ajaxapi.views.spectrumvote(request)[source]¶

This is the POST function that is the django part of the Ajax/Javascript asynchronous voting function. The function receives a request from a consensus object, and creates/deletes a UpDownVote object as requested from the Javascript that calls this function.

Returns: JSON object containing an updated count to modify vote totals in UI, and a image filename to modify graphical elements of the UI.

openassembly.ajaxapi.views.starvote(request)[source]¶

This is the POST function that is the django part of the Ajax/Javascript asynchronous voting function. The function receives a request from a consensus object, and creates/deletes a UpDownVote object as requested from the Javascript that calls this function.

Returns: JSON object containing an updated count to modify vote totals in UI, and a image filename to modify graphical elements of the UI.
